H0.text: Celandine, topaz and gamboge are shades of which colour. Orange

H1.text: Celandine, topaz and gamboge are shades of which colour. Brown

H2.text: Celandine, topaz and gamboge are shades of which colour. Golden

H3.text: Celandine, topaz and gamboge are shades of which colour. Yelow

A4.text: Gamboge is a deep saffron to mustard yellow pigment and dye.

A5.text: Gamboge is an orange-brown resin, derived from trees of the genus Garcinia, which becomes yellow when powdered.
